message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Hey Alice, thanks for the offer, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $85. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $88 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but I'm still a little high.  How about $87?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $89 for the product.
